channel.title: Data Analysis on Main
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis on Main

item.title: Project 4 PCA & Deep Learning
item.description: In this Project I used the israeli 2021 elections data and the israeli socio-economic data to try and profile the voters of each party based on their socio-economic background, using PCA. Since I’m also practicing my TensorFlow and Keras deep learning skills, I tried to create a multi layer perceptron model which tried to predict a city’s socio-economic background based on the votes each party got in the said city.
